exercises.name: Pendulum
exercises.instructions: Lean forward with support and let the arm swing gently in small circles.

exercises.name: Wall Climb
exercises.instructions: Walk fingers up the wall to a comfortable height, then down slowly.

exercises.name: External Rotation (Band)
exercises.instructions: Elbow at side, rotate forearm outward against light band resistance.

exercises.name: Scapular Retraction
exercises.instructions: Squeeze shoulder blades gently together, hold 3 seconds, relax.
